timeouts.shop: You have been hanging around my shop not buying anything for long enough, scram!
timeouts.building: I am sorry, but we are closing the building. Unless you are staying at one of our facilities we have to escort you out.
timeouts.midnightDrabWarning: Uh-oh. At this hour the drabs come out of their hiding place to stir up trouble. Be careful!
timeouts.lastValidHourWarning: Within an hour all hotels are closing and sun will come up soon. Find a place to spend the day!

messages.stayedTheNight: You feel replenished after a good days sleep. It's nighttime again, time to go out!
